p: TPC of the investigated extract was determined by the Folin-Ciocalteu assay [ 26]. DPPH radical scavenging assay, ferric reducing antioxidant power assay (FRAP), and ABTS radical-scavenging activity assay were carried out in triplicate as described in Ghareeb et al. [ 26]. The total antioxidant capacity (TAC) was investigated using a commercially available ELISA kit (MBS726896, mybiosource, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA) according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions [ 27].
